snippet: Our individual tastes sometimes run counter to what our friends or colleagues consider tolerable. Below, some things that staff members say they love, even when they suspect no one else does (or will admit to loving).
abstract: Our individual tastes sometimes run counter to what our friends or colleagues consider tolerable. Below, some things that staff members say they love, even when they suspect no one else does (or will admit to loving).

headline.main: Things We Love (That We Think No One Else Loves)
